content.question: Two particles move along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis with velocities given by <math alttext="v sub 1, of t, equals, negative 3 times t squared, plus 8 t, plus 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math> and <math alttext="v sub 2, of t, equals the sine of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></math> for time <math alttext="t greater than or equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>. At what time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> do the two particles have equal acceleration?

choices.label: There is no such time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration
